name: Small Arms Survey
legal: Associated programme of the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies in Geneva (itself a registered Swiss foundation)
headAddress: Foundation for the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies (IHEID)
goal: The Small Arms Survey is a global centre of excellence whose mandate is to generate evidence-based, impartial, and policy-relevant knowledge on all aspects of small arms and armed violence. It is the principal international source of expertise, information, and analysis on small arms and armed violence issues, and acts as a resource for governments, policy-makers, researchers, and civil society.
interests: European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU firearms directive
EU small arms strategy
Project SAFTE (studying the acquisition of firearms by terrorists)
